entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Courtenay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:09 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Comox Airport 12:00 AM PST Saturday 07 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 8.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: 6.1°C
Wind: SSE 33 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: A few showers. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6 except low plus 2 inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early in the evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches inland overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Temperature steady near 6 except low plus 2 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023
